content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Copper cable factory at position (-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5.

### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or other entities.

### Errors when assembling machines are not powered
- Check the power connections to the assembling machine. Ensure it is connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning properly.

### Errors when furnaces are not smelting
- Verify that the furnace has the necessary resources and is connected to a power source. Check for any missing fuel or input materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
